name: The Code
overview: Set in the cold war, In The Code is a text adventure in which you are a secret agent who has to try to infiltrate a secret place in the KGB stronghold. Your mission, should you decide to accept it, is to go to a place deep within that stronghold from where no one has returned alive. We have only one message from your 25 predecessors. Cut short by a blood curdling scream. It said, "Nothing is what it appears to be and..."
